message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it would significantly benefit you. I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my initial offer and for presenting your counter-proposal. While $2,000,000 represents a fair reflection of the product's value, I understand your budgetary constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000. I believe this revised price point offers a mutually beneficial opportunity.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're finding common ground. Given my financial situation, I can only commit to $1,500,000 for the product. I hope this revised figure is acceptable to you.
